answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
There several helpful resources regarding succession planning on the Knowledge Network.
Questions similar to yours were previously asked and answered on the network. You can see the links to those below.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/kn/Question/20767/Succession_Planning
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/kn/Question/20539/Succession_Planning
I have also included a Management Preparation brochure which deals with succession planning.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/2045/Management_Preparation_Program_Brochure
I also found an article detailing the succession plans proposed in Henrico County, VA.
http://icma.org/en/Article/11017/Succession_Management_Preparing_for_the_Future
Another article you may find helpful is Succeeding at Succession which describes the best policies for succession planning.
http://icma.org/en/Article/10832/Succeeding_at_Succession
You can find more documents and articles that I may have missed here on the Knowledge Network Succession Planning topic page.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/topic/252/succession_planning
I hope these help!
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

text: I am looking for a Succession Plan and Succession Planning Process.  If you have one, please send it o Kevin.Patton@durhamnc.gov.  I have a frame work for a succession plan; however i wanted to try to compare mine with one that has been developed.
